company_info.Company Description: Trip Store LLP is Travel & Tour Company based out of Mumbai. With a experience of 25 years in the Travel Trade Industry. We are specialized in Customized tours to Destinations across the world.Our approach is different. We don’t plan any trips in advance, instead believe in customizing each trip by designing an ideal itinerary for you. Whether you know precisely where you want to go or need some insight, Trip Store has you covered. We believe in creating a journey that will exceed your expectations. Our passion is to guide you to your dream destination by alleviating the stress for you.Visit our Website- www.tripstore.in

jd_information.description: Holiday package – Sales :· Prior experience in Travel business specifically in Holiday packages· Working in coordination with operations team & suppliers to get quotations and rates· Speaking with suppliers to get the best rates and comparing the quotes by different suppliers· Choosing the best quote and offering the same to sales team or customer· Coordination with account for payment collection of booking· Coordination with ticketing team to get the tickets issue· Coordination with visa team for processing of visa for customers· Handling on tour issues· Taking feedback & testimonials of travelled client.· Office location – Mulund
